mapper.select: select storeName, storePosition, majorClass, detailClass, standardClass, sidoCode, sidoName, gugunCode, gugunName, dongCode, dongName, concat(streetAddress, if(mainAddrNumber, concat(' ', mainAddrNumber, if(subAddrNumber, concat("-", subAddrNumber), '')), '')) as "streetAddress", lng, lat from commercialinfo where dongCode = #{dongCode};
